word:
MR No. 1383 - Second Appeal to Dr. Lindsay to Come to Australia

     (Written from "Sunnyside," Cooranbong, NSW, October 12, 1899, to Dr. Kate Lindsay.) 


     I have written much this morning to Dr. Anthony and his wife, Brother Bicknall and his wife, Brother Harmon Lindsay, and Mother Wessels, and I now address you. When are you coming to Australia? We need your assistance. We ask you to come just as soon as possible. You can help us much with your experience.
